name: BOX FOX: Cookie Hunter
description:
[FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED]

Simple game all about collecting as many cookies as you can with 3 lives. Avoid the Exploding Chickens.

Currently in Development - so more content MAY be coming - This is literally just a quick project I made out of boredom so I might not even touch it again. Just a small quirky thing :)

Hope you enjoy it regardless!
